name: kuvasz
description: Kuvasz is an uptime monitoring and incident notification service. It regularly checks endpoints, records availability metrics and sends alerts when services go down, providing a central dashboard for small to medium infrastructures.
features: Uptime Monitoring: Regular health checks for endpoints with availability tracking. Monitor service uptime continuously.
Response Time Tracking: Measure and graph response times for performance monitoring. Identify slow services.
Incident Detection: Automatic downtime detection with incident creation. Know when services fail.
Alert Notifications: Email and webhook notifications for downtime events. Get notified immediately.
Escalation Policies: Configure alert escalation for critical services. Ensure issues are addressed.
Status Dashboard: Central view of all monitored services and their status. Track infrastructure health.
Historical Data: View uptime history and incident reports over time. Analyze reliability trends.
SSL Monitoring: Check SSL certificate validity and expiration dates. Prevent certificate issues.
Multi-Protocol: Monitor HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, and ICMP endpoints. Support various service types.
Check Intervals: Configure monitoring frequency per endpoint. Balance accuracy and resource usage.
Maintenance Windows: Schedule maintenance periods to suppress alerts. Avoid false alarms.
API Access: Programmatic monitoring management and status queries. Integrate with existing tools.
